cnd1:2.2: maḷakassa → aḷakassa (^snp5.1#904 [Vatthugāthā]); mūlakassa (bj); muḷakassa (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); mūḷhakassa (mr) | samāsane → samāsanne (mr)
cnd1:13.1: Bhotī → pahotī (sya-all); bhoti (mr) | carahi → yo carati (mr)
cnd1:14.4: jinānaṃ hettha → jinānaṃ heta (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); janānañhettha (mr)
cnd1:36.2: puramāhissatiṃ → purimaṃ māhissatiṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); puramāhiyati (mr) | tadā → tathā (bj); sadā (mr)
cnd1:41.2: Pītaraṃsiṃva → sataraṃsiṃva (bj ^snp5.1#943 [Vatthugāthā]); vītaraṃsiṃva (sya-all); vītaraṃsiva (pts-vp-pli1); jitaraṃsiṃ sītaraṃsiṃ (mr) | bhāṇumaṃ → bhānumaṃ (bj)
cnd1:41.4: Paripūraṃ upāgataṃ → pāripūrimupāgataṃ (bj); paripūriṃ upāgataṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1 ^snp5.1#943 [Vatthugāthā])
